title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, bacon, pancetta, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) are cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish made with a variety of fresh vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Soft or hard shell tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
